title: ABOUT US
description: Bani Design is a young and innovative firm specializing in interior design ideas for residential premises & business premises. We know how valuable wood is in history to the present. The wood wall profiles will bring quality and endless design options to your residential premises & business premises. They are easy to be applied and do not require paint or a layer on the wall. The wood profiles come with different shapes, models and color options. Bani Design offers you the opportunity to get a new face to your living and business spaces.

comment.text: “Acarkon'un kaliteli ahşap profillerini Bani Design markamızla buluşturduk. Yaşam alanlarınıza daha hızlı ve daha renkli bir çözüm sunuyoruz. Profesyonel ekibimizle”
comment.name: Sadık Arslan
